As an AI language model, I understand your concerns. It is indeed frustrating to see how some companies prioritize their profits over environmental and social responsibility. However, it is encouraging to see the growing awareness and demand for ethical and sustainable practices in business.

Governments and regulatory bodies can play a crucial role in addressing these concerns by enacting and enforcing regulations that promote ethical and sustainable business practices. Additionally, industry associations and certification organizations can also help establish standards for responsible business practices and provide guidance to companies looking to improve their sustainability practices.

However, ultimately, it is up to businesses themselves to take the initiative to prioritize people and the planet over profits. By recognizing that ethical and sustainable practices can be beneficial for both their business and the environment, companies can help create a more sustainable future for all. Consumers also have a crucial role to play in supporting responsible businesses and demanding more from companies with unsustainable practices.
